March 13, 1961
Miss Martha Haueisen
Telecommunications Center
2470 North Star Road
Columbus 21, Ohio
Dear Miss Haueisen:
Today I am sending to you under sepÂ¬
arate cover 100 sheets of letterhead
and envelopes similar to this paper,
but without the imprinting of Mr,
Harley9s name and title* Therefore,
you can easily add Chairman of the
Board to Mr, Hull's signature, I
hope this will work out satisfactorily
for you and if you need more, please
let me know.
Sincerely yours,
Mary Elizabeth McXlvane
Administrative Assistant
